MAADEN UMM WUâ€™AL PHOSPHATE PROJECT

The project is the world's largest phosphate project, of which the ore beneficiation system design capacity of 15.5 million tons / year, concentrate ores 5.3 million tons / year, is the world's largest phosphate ore beneficiation system.

PKchem (HK) once again wins such a large international project to undertake the challenges in the EPC of the laboratory of crusher, conveyor and beneficiation processing unit. The on-site team of PKchem (HK) has always been professional, dedicated attitude, and actively cooperates with the parties. It has won the Saudi owners praise. Meanwhile PKchem (HK) is proud for contributions in Chinese project to "go out" strategy.
